plot: After Elise, a 17 year old girl unknowingly saves a vampire from death, she finds herself running from a secret that can threaten the lives of everyone she loves and even her own.
plot_en: After Elise, a 17 year old girl unknowingly saves a vampire from death, she finds herself running from a secret that can threaten the lives of everyone she loves and even her own.
plot_es: After Elise, a 17 year old girl unknowingly saves a vampire from death, she finds herself running from a secret that can threaten the lives of everyone she loves and even her own.
title: Blood Lies
